It's similar to a Photo Sticker machine you see in local stores: Purikura, Icue. We have over 300+ cute sticker for you to create your cute pocket photo. News: This app supports iPad natively with full width and height. Features: - Add frames on your photo - Add stickers on the photo - Add your drawing on the photo - Undo function is provided - Add Text on the image - Position your stickers anywhere you like. - Easy and simple to use. Instruction: First open the photo, then zoom in and out so it position the photo correctly, then click Crop Image Icon. After that, the crop image icon is disabled. It will be active when you start to work on a new photo. A game about positive impact on nature and eco-friendly living. Ecology strategy games where you reconnect with nature and create a green world for future civilizations. Take on the role of a planet protection fund and stabilize its environmental situation. Join the global movement to save the planet Earth! About game ECO inc. Save The Earth: * Take on the role of a planet protection fund and develop environmental initiatives. * Various game mechanics: from resource management to diplomacy. * Complex tasks and unexpected events that will test your strategic thinking. * An opportunity to make a real contribution to saving the planet by raising awareness of environmental issues. *Global Challenges: Climate change, environmental pollution, resource depletion - all these challenges require your solution. Don't let the environmental catastrophe spread like a "plague" across the planet Earth. *Strategic Planning: Develop long-term plans, consider all factors, and make fateful decisions that will determine the future of the Earth. *Economic Development: Manage resources, invest in new technologies and build a green future world. *Volunteering: Send your heroes to help those in need, participate in international projects and fight for a clean planet. * Education: Raise your eco-awareness, study real problems and find ways to solve them. How to play the planet saving game tutorial guide: The player's goal is to stabilize the environmental situation on the entire planet at an early stage. Then, step by step, restore and improve the eco-situation of the Earth. Yeah, it's an epic quest ;) At the end of the game, you will receive statistics on how successful your mission was. Each step leads to different consequences, you will need to take thoughtful and quick actions. Useful information: Green Days: Eco Calendar â€” your personal guide to the planetâ€™s most important environmental events! Follow Earth Days, Forest Days, Ocean Days, and Biodiversity Days. Plan your eco-actions and help make the world greener! List of Global Green Holidays: February 2 â€” World Wetlands Day March 3 â€” World Wildlife Day March 21 â€” International Day of Forests March 22 â€” World Water Day March 23 â€” World Meteorological Day April 7 â€” World Health Day (eco-focus) April 22 â€” Earth Day May 22 â€” International Day for Biological Diversity June 5 â€” World Environment Day June 8 â€” World Oceans Day June 17 â€” World Day to Combat Desertification and Drought July 28 â€” World Nature Conservation Day September 16 â€” International Day for the Preservation of the Ozone Layer October 4 â€” World Animal Day October 13 â€” International Day for Disaster Risk Reduction November 6 â€” International Day for Preventing the Exploitation of the Environment in War and Armed Conflict December 11 â€” International Mountain Day Join millions of eco heroes around the world and become part of the global movement to save the planet! :)

8mm is so realistic it was even used to film scenes in the Oscar-winning documentary Searching for Sugar Man! We have established the de facto standard of real-time retro film emulation. It was featured by Apple in App of the Day, App of the Week, In the Director's Chair, App Store Essentials, etc. 8mm Vintage Camera captures the beauty and magic of old-school vintage movies right through your viewfinder. Dust and scratches, retro colors, flickering, light leaks, and even frame shake, all can be instantly added with a single tap of the finger. SHOOT BOTH PHOTOS AND VIDEOS WITH SOPHISTICATED LIVE EFFECTS â€¢ Combine effects of film color, halation, dust & scratch, film grain, and softening to create authentic old-school movies â€¢ Adjust the strength of the effects to achieve your own unique visual style â€¢ 10 Lenses (frame) effects: Projector, Vignetting, Light Leak, Color Fringing, Super 8, Screen, 16mm, Tube, color negatives of Super 8 and 16mm â€¢ 21 Retro & Aged Films: 1920, Noir, 60s, 70s, Sakura, XPro, Siena, Pela, Indigo, Tuscan, Two-Color, 2-Strip, 3X, and monochromes â€¢ Additional 21 filters that emulate real historical films and expired films - available with the 8mm Pro subscription â€¢ Jitter Button to imitate real 8mm projectors frame shakes â€¢ Sound Switch to add projector sound for extra authenticity or mute the video for a silent movie effect. â€¢ Up to 4K 30fps with original unfiltered video recording on newer devices A COMPACT EDITOR FOR MOVIE CREATION - Apply film and frame effects to clips - Trim video, pan & zoom photo - Add a soundtrack from your music library - Choose from 5 unique themes with matching titles, transitions 8MM PRO SUBSCRIPTION - You can subscribe or make a one-time purchase for unlimited access to all current filters and future updates - Start your subscription with a free 7-day trial. Once the trial is over, youâ€™ll be charged an annual subscription fee - Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can go to your Settings > Apple ID > Subscriptions to turn auto-renew off
